text: Those movies sure got me into a rut.
author: Elvis Presley

text: Funny things happen to you in movies for silly reasons.
author: Michael Caine

text: January is the garbage can of movies in America, directly after all the Oscar contenders have been out.
author: Michael Caine

text: My wife comes with me on all the movies, but she is not an appendage to a film star or anything like that. She is a completely intertwined partner. She is the other half of me. Also, we're still very much in love with each other. We always have been, we always will be.
author: Michael Caine
